actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 49 of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit union organization in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any individual or entity to solicit to enroll or enroll any member of the armed forces in any labor organization or for any member of the armed forces to join, or encourage others to join any labor organization. Sets forth penalties for violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 49 of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit union organization in the Armed Forces.
